law.catch_line: Stay, suspension, or postponement of order.
law.text: The commissioner may stay, suspend, or postpone the effective date of an order issued under this subtitle, pending the administrative proceeding and the issuance of a final order resulting from the proceeding, upon written request by the affected person or licensee.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 818, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 98, sec. 11, effective January 1, 2010.
